title: Official Diamond Overlords Club Thread.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/a827687539e5f819ead02f46324712a8.png

Requirements to post in here:
-Diamond 5 or above
-A fek that isn't based on anime
-one girl max is allowed
-Can't main shaco, nasus, veigar, rengar, or any other freelo abuser.
-Must frequently use dank memes.

What we will be discussing:
-Why we are so great.
-Why mages and assassins should live in peace instead of being alihators.
-Why nasus and veigar are freelo time-abusers.
-When will Lissandra get her much needed buffs?

WARNING: If you post and you are below diamond you are liable to be op.gg'd and criticized based on your most played champion.
